pullrequest.title: Found some key[self_collide] errors from Element.hh when trying Actor

content.raw:
The remaining errors seem to do with the actor itself (the ones fixed in the commit are the errors from the links).  The error from the actor could disappear by adding ```_sdf->GetElement("self_collide")->Set(false)```, which I commented out in the commit.

The reason I commented this out, is because in order for this to work, there has to be a "self_collide" element defined in the actor.sdf. (Otherwise, the GetElement will crash gazebo)

By the way, I've tested the *"self_collide" adding to actor.sdf* in my local environment. The remaining errors did disappear when I tried this.
content.html:
The remaining errors seem to do with the actor itself (the ones fixed in the commit are the errors from the links). The error from the actor could disappear by adding _sdf->GetElement("self_collide")->Set(false), which I commented out in the commit.

The reason I commented this out, is because in order for this to work, there has to be a "self_collide" element defined in the actor.sdf. (Otherwise, the GetElement will crash gazebo)

By the way, I've tested the "self_collide" adding to actor.sdf in my local environment. The remaining errors did disappear when I tried this.
